TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {6542=American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 – IDEA Part B, 6067=2015 IDEA Basic Entitlement Allocations – Excel Spreadsheet – REVISED, 7495=The ESS Funding Unit distributes IDEA formula-driven, non-competitive, and discretionary, competitive grants to eligible schools throughout Arizona. The grant process is fully automated through the ADE Grants Management Enterprise system. Grants are approved, amended, and financially monitored through the automated system. There are approximately twenty grant categories and the unit processes approximately 1000 applications per year., 6323=Special Education Cost Study 2007}
